Codeunit "ESCA FTP Request Mgt."

ID 71096617

Properties

Name Value
Access Public
TableNo "ESCA FTP Setup"

Methods

UploadFile

Uploads a file to an FTP server.

procedure UploadFile(FTPCode: Code[20], FTPPath: Text, TempBlob: Codeunit "Temp Blob", FileName: Text[250], HideNotification: Boolean, var FTPRequest: Record "ESCA FTP Request"): Boolean

Parameters

Name Type Description
FTPCode Code[20]

The code representing the FTP setup
FTPPath Text

The path on the FTP server where the file will be uploaded
TempBlob "Temp Blob"

The codeunit containing the file contents stream
FileName Text[250]

The name of the file to be uploaded
HideNotification Boolean

A flag indicating whether to hide the notification after upload process
FTPRequest Record "ESCA FTP Request"

A reference to the FTP request record

Returns

Type Description
Boolean

A boolean value indicating the success of the upload
